```{r}
#Use Eulidean distance measurement to calculate distance between two points

distance <- function(p1, p2) {
  Matrixdistance <- matrix(NA, nrow=dim(p1)[1], ncol=dim(p2)[1])
  for(i in 1:nrow(p2)) {
    Matrixdistance[,i] <- sqrt(rowSums(t(t(p1)-p2[i,])^2))
  }
  Matrixdistance
}



```
